4.title: Global Preferences
4.content: This group likes to do some of the same things: . | Eating good food, | Food tours | Museums (in moderation, prefer history over art) | Nature (low intensity, no hikes up mountains, but short walks are ok) | Good views | People watching | Relaxing | Unique shopping (not luxury shopping) | .
